"**Assignee**: Organization(s) and individual(s) that have an ownership interest in the legal rights a patent offers"[^1]

[^1]: source: https://asklib.library.hbs.edu/faq/267606

"**Inventor**: individual(s) who have contributed to the claimed invention. However, they may or may not have an ownership interest in the legal rights of the patent."

"**Applicant**: Organization or individual that files the patent application is called the “applicant.” This could be the original inventor, or it could be the assignee."


[IPC](https://www.wipo.int/classifications/ipc/en/): International Patent Classification 

[CPC](https://www.uspto.gov/web/patents/classification/cpc/html/cpc.html): Cooperative Patent Classification
